elseif c=="g" then draw_stones("st-grate1",{i-1,line}, {1,1}, 1) elseif c=="G" then draw_stones("st-grate1",{i-1,line}, {1,1}, 1) set_item("it-seed", i-1, line)
elseif c=="b" then yy1( "black", i-1, line) elseif c=="w" then yy1( "white", i-1, line) end end end
function yy1( color, x, y) stone = format( "st-%s4", color) set_stone( stone, x, y) end
